Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute near Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at O'Hare
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at O'Hare due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at O'Hare due to signal problems.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between UIC-Halsted and Forest Park
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between UIC-Halsted and Forest Park due to a mechanical problem on a train.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between UIC-Halsted and Forest Park due to a mechanical problem on a train.

As a result, trains are operating only between O'Hare and UIC-Halsted at this time.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
